column3: if we had not gotten great feedback about this place
column4: we would NOT have agreed to the Â crazy long wait. We were told it would be 60-90 minute wait. But
column5: we would be given a heads up via text when our table was ready -- with 7 minutes to check in after being notified. At least this way
